name: prelude-ls
description: prelude.ls is a JavaScript functional programming library. It is the recommended base library for, and is written in, LiveScript. It is based off of Haskell's Prelude module.
readme: # prelude.ls is a JavaScript functional programming library. It is the recommended base library for, and is written in, LiveScript. It is based in part off of Haskell's Prelude module. See **[the prelude.ls site](http://gkz.github.com/prelude-ls/)** for examples, a reference, and more. You can install via npm `npm install prelude-ls`
